message:
Launches 2 dark energy blasts from your weapon.
#yDark Magic
Magic Damage per Projectile: {0}% + {1}
Range: {2}m

(The effect is enhanced at skill lv. {3}.)

Launches 2 dark energy blasts from your weapon.
#yDark Magic
Magic Damage per Blast: {0}% + {1}
Range: {2}m

Increases the range of of blasts and penetrates enemies.
Additional Damage: {3}%
Charge ahead 3m to knock enemies into the air. \n#yPhysical Damage: {0}% + {1}

Launches air blades to deal damage to nearby enemies.
#yPhysical Damage: {0}% + 1

(The effect is enhanced at skill lv. {2}.)

Launches air blades to deal damage to nearby enemies.
#yPhysical Damage: {0}% + {1}

Hits the ground and draws enemies toward you.
Additional Damage: {2}%
Curses the land 3m ahead of you. Dark thorns shoot from the land and attack enemies for {0} seconds.\n#yDark Magic\nMagic Damage: {1}% +{2}

Summons a ghost to scare the fight straight out of your enemies. Monsters hit by the ghost will be unable to attack you for a while. 
#yDark Magic
Magic Damage: {0}% + {1}
Fright Duration: {2} sec
Summons a powerful guardian spirit to attack. The spirit has a chance to destroy Super Armor. \n#yPhysical Damage: {0}% + {1}

Summons little spirits to protect nearby allies. A certain portion of damage will be taken from MP instead of HP. Damage taken to MP will be reduced. 
#ySuper Armor: +{0}%
MP Lost: {1}% of Damage
MP Damage Reduction: -{2}%
Duration: {3} seconds
Summons a desert spirit to boost the stats of nearby allies. \n#ySTR, AGI, INT, VIT: +{0}%\nDuration: {1} sec
Spin, then kick by pressing the special attack button.\n#yPhysical Damage: {0}%
Use a special attack to damage a knocked down enemy by draining its spirit energy.\n#yMagic Damage: {0}%
Double-tap an arrow key or press [Shift] plus an arrow key to evade in that direction. Allows you to evade all attacks for a short time. \n#yCooldown: {0} sec
Use a special attack to launch a stunned enemy into the air and tumble backwards.\n#yPhysical Damage: {0}%
While in the air, press the special attack button to kick. If the kick connects, it causes a magical explosion that damages enemies and launches you away. \n#yMagic Damage: {0}%
Press the regular attack button while on the ground to summon the hands of the dead to set you on your feet and damage nearby enemies.\n#yMagic Damage: {0}%

Double-tap an arrow key or press #y[Shift]#w plus an arrow key when you're being attacked to evade in that direction and leave an explosive charm at your feet that attracts enemies before exploding. \n#yMagic Damage: {0}% + {1}\nCooldown: {2} sec
When launched into the air, press the #y[Jump]#w key to land on your feet.\n#yCooldown: {0} sec
Increases your {0} recovery by #y{1}%#w every minute.
